nodes.text: Sleeping Rose was an establishment in a seedy part of the Coruscant Underworld, situated next to Enmonst Rclub. Aurebesh signage spelled out the name. During the Clone Wars, bounty hunter Cad Bane stayed in an apartment in the same block as Sleeping Rose, while planning the Mission to the Jedi Temple.
During pre-production, the establishment was called "Hotel 77", as seen in concept art of the Coruscant underworld.
